definition: A term used to describe something of exceptional quality, typically associated with products, materials, or services that are considered high-end or premium. It is commonly used in the context of luxury goods, high-quality craftsmanship, or top-tier offerings.

examples.german: Die hochwertige Kleidung ist sehr beliebt.
examples.english: The high-quality clothing is very popular.

examples.german: Das Restaurant bietet hochwertige Speisen an.
Die hochwertigen MÃ¶bel sind sehr langlebig.
examples.english: The high-quality furniture is very durable.

examples.german: Die hochwertige Technologie verbessert die Effizienz.
